name: CryptoTicker
0:
”Alexa, ask Crypto Ticker how much is Ethereum?”
”Alexa, ask Crypto Ticker what is the price of Bitcoin?”
”Alexa, ask Crypto Ticker what is the value of Bitcoin?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: crypto ticker
des: Crypto info allows you to get price information for a specified cryptocurrency and its percent change over the past 24 hours. After getting up, trying asking Crypto Ticker about your favorite coin. Crypto Ticker uses the CoinMarketCap JSON API to provide the information you will be give.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
